strapiPost.title: Shopping And Pet Care Now Available In Same Place
strapiPost.content:
A new partnership is happening which allows running errands and pet care to happen simultaneously. 

  • In-store care: Walmart and Best Friends Pet Hotel (Best Friends) entered into a partnership where Best Friends opened locations inside 10 select Walmart stores across 5 states. One of the initial locations was the Walmart Supercenter in Springdale on 4870 Elm Springs Road.
  • Playdate: The Best Friends centers are for all kinds of pets, so now when your furry family member wants to come shopping with you, they can! There is a $14/1.5hr option as well as a $35 full-day option for dropping off your pet to play and be cared for. 

For more information, click HERE.
